item.title: ULUWATU SUNSET TOUR
item.dc:creator: useradmin
item.description: ULUWATU – SUNSET TOUR PRICE Rp. 700K Embark on a Journey to Witness the Enchanting Sunset of Uluwatu: A Cultural and Scenic Adventure Contact us Venture into the heart of Bali’s captivating southwest coast and immerse yourself in the rich culture and natural beauty of Uluwatu. Explore traditional villages, witness the intricate craftsmanship of local […]
item.content:encoded:
ULUWATU - SUNSET TOUR

PRICE Rp. 700K

Embark on a Journey to Witness the Enchanting Sunset of Uluwatu: A Cultural and Scenic Adventure

Contact us

Venture into the heart of Bali’s captivating southwest coast and immerse yourself in the rich culture and natural beauty of Uluwatu. Explore traditional villages, witness the intricate craftsmanship of local artisans, and experience the breathtaking sunset over the Indian Ocean.Â 09:00 AM: Depart from your hotel and embark on your Uluwatu Sunset Adventure.

Contact us

Let's got to Peliatan Ubud

Journey to Peliatan

09:30 AM: Journey to Peliatan, a village renowned for its vibrant art scene. Explore the Peliatan Art Village, a hub of creativity where you can witness talented artists at work. Admire the intricate paintings, sculptures, and traditional Balinese handicrafts on display. Engage with the artists and learn about their unique techniques and inspirations.

journey to Mas

11:00 AM: Continue your journey to Mas, a village renowned for its exquisite wood carving traditions. Wander through the bustling village and observe skilled artisans transforming wood into intricate sculptures, masks, and other decorative pieces. Witness the delicate craftsmanship and intricate details that characterize Mas wood carvings.

12:30 PM: Savor a delectable lunch at a local warung, enjoying fresh seafood and traditional Balinese cuisine. 01:30 PM: Journey to Celuk, a village renowned for its centuries-old gold and silver smithing traditions. Explore the workshops of skilled artisans and witness the meticulous process of transforming precious metals into exquisite jewelry, ornaments, and decorative pieces. Admire the intricate designs and craftsmanship that characterize Celuk gold and silverwork.


Contact us

trek to Uluwatu

03:00 PM: Embark on a short trek to Uluwatu, a sacred clifftop peninsula renowned for its breathtaking sunsets and ancient temples. Explore the Pura Luhur Uluwatu Temple, a majestic Hindu temple perched atop the cliffs. Witness the Kecak dance performance, a captivating ritual performed at sunset as the sun paints the sky with hues of gold, orange, and pink.

Journey to Jimbaran Bay

05:30 PM: Journey to Jimbaran Bay, a picturesque beach cove renowned for its fresh seafood and romantic atmosphere. Indulge in a delectable dinner at a beachfront restaurant, savoring fresh seafood grilled to perfection while enjoying the enchanting sunset over the Indian Ocean.

07:30 PM: Depart from Jimbaran

Don't just see the sights, experience them!

Travel is more than just checking off destinations on a list. It’s about immersing yourself in a new culture, connecting with local people, and creating memories that will last a lifetime.

Contact us

item.title: BEST SUNRISE PART OF BALI
item.dc:creator: useradmin
item.description: BEST SUNRISE PART OF BALI Embark on a Journey to Witness the Enchanting Sunrise of East Bali: A Cultural and Scenic Adventure. Price : Rp. 900k Contact us East Bali Venture into the heart of East Bali and witness the breathtaking sunrise as it paints the sky with hues of gold, orange, and pink. Immerse […]
item.content:encoded:
BEST SUNRISE PART OF BALI

Embark on a Journey to Witness the Enchanting Sunrise of East Bali: A Cultural and Scenic Adventure. Price :

Rp. 900k

Contact us

East Bali

Venture into the heart of East Bali and witness the breathtaking sunrise as it paints the sky with hues of gold, orange, and pink. Immerse yourself in the rich culture and traditions of the region, explore ancient temples and palaces, and discover the beauty of pristine beaches and lush landscapes.

Contact us

Let's Unveiling Balinese Culture from the east side

Lempuyang The best ciew of lempuyang temple

03:00 AM Depart from your hotel and embark on your East Bali Sunrise Adventure. 04:00 AM Ascend to the summit of Mount Lempuyang, home to the Lempuyang Luhur Temple, also known as the "Gates of Heaven." Witness the first rays of sunlight illuminate the majestic temple gates, creating a mesmerizing spectacle. Capture stunning photographs of this iconic landmark as it emerges from the darkness, bathed in the soft glow of dawn.

Tirta Gangga water palace

06:00 AM Journey to Tirta Gangga, a magnificent water palace nestled amidst lush rice paddies. Explore the intricate network of pools, fountains, and sculptures, each depicting Hindu mythology and Balinese culture. Stroll through the serene gardens and admire the harmonious blend of architecture and nature.

Taman Ujung Water Garden Park

08:00 AM: Savor a delectable breakfast at a local warung, indulging in authentic Balinese cuisine. Enjoy the flavors of fresh seafood, spicy sambal, and aromatic rice dishes, all prepared with local ingredients and traditional cooking techniques. 09:00 AM: Continue your journey to Taman Ujung, a captivating water garden park situated on the coast of East Bali. Wander through the serene gardens adorned with pools, fountains, and pavilions, each reflecting the architectural splendor of the Karangasem Kingdom. Capture stunning photographs of the park’s picturesque landscapes and admire the harmonious blend of Balinese artistry and natural beauty.


Contact us

Kusamba Making Traditional salt

11:00 AM: Discover the traditional salt-making process at Kusamba, a village renowned for its centuries-old salt harvesting techniques. Observe the villagers as they laboriously collect seawater, evaporate it under the sun, and transform it into pure, crystalline salt. Witness the unique cultural heritage and resilience of this coastal community.

old court justice of klungkung kingdom

12:30 PM Savor a delectable lunch at a local warung, enjoying fresh seafood and traditional Balinese cuisine. 01:30 PM: Journey to Klungkung, the former capital of the Klungkung Kingdom. Explore the Klungkung Royal Palace, once a grand residence of Balinese royalty, and admire the remnants of its architectural splendor. Witness the intricate carvings and sculptures that adorn the palace walls, offering a glimpse into the kingdom's illustrious past.

Tips 1

Dress warmly as the temperatures can be chilly at this time of the morning.

Tips 2

Respect the sacred nature of the site and maintain a quiet demeanor.

Tips 3

Capture stunning photographs of the water garden park and its surroundings.

Tips 4

Observe the traditional salt-making process and learn about its importance to the local community.

Don't just see the sights, experience them!

Price Rp. 900k

Travel is more than just checking off destinations on a list. It’s about immersing yourself in a new culture, connecting with local people, and creating memories that will last a lifetime.

Contact Us

item.title: UBUD CULTURE TOUR
item.dc:creator: useradmin
item.description: Unveiling the Essence of Ubud: A Cultural Immersion Tour Embark on a captivating journey into the heart of Balinese culture with the Ubud Culture Tour, an immersive exploration of the region’s rich heritage, artistic traditions, and breathtaking natural beauty. Contact us 09:00 AM Depart from your hotel and embark on your Ubud Cultural Immersion Tour. […]
item.content:encoded:
Unveiling the Essence of Ubud: A Cultural Immersion Tour

Embark on a captivating journey into the heart of Balinese culture with the Ubud Culture Tour, an immersive exploration of the region’s rich heritage, artistic traditions, and breathtaking natural beauty.

Contact us

09:00 AM

Depart from your hotel and embark on your Ubud Cultural Immersion Tour. 09:30 AM: Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Balinese dance at the Batubulan Village, renowned for its captivating Kecak Dance and Barong Dance performances. Witness the mesmerizing movements of the dancers, accompanied by the rhythmic chanting of the Kecak chorus. Experience the dynamic interplay between the Barong, representing good, and the Rangda, symbolizing evil, as they battle in an epic tale of good versus evil.

Contact Us

Beyond the Kecak and Barong Dances let's Unveiling Bali's Cultural Gems

11:00 AM Delve into the world of Balinese craftsmanship at the Village Factory

where you'll witness the intricate techniques of silverwork, batik making, wood carving, and hand weaving. Observe skilled artisans transform raw materials into exquisite works of art, each piece reflecting the rich cultural heritage of Bali. 12:30 PM: Savor a delectable lunch at a local warung, indulging in authentic Balinese cuisine. Enjoy the flavors of fresh seafood, spicy sambal, and aromatic rice dishes, all prepared with local ingredients and traditional cooking techniques.

1:30 PM Singapadu Village

Step into a traditional Balinese house at Singapadu Village and gain insights into the daily lives of the local people. Observe the unique architectural features, such as the thatched roofs, open courtyards, and ancestral shrines. Engage with the villagers and learn about their customs, traditions, and way of life.

3:00 PM: Embark on a short trek to Kemenuh Village

and discover the hidden gem of Tegenungan Waterfall. Cascading down lush greenery, this waterfall offers a refreshing oasis and a picturesque backdrop for stunning photographs. Take a dip in the cool waters or simply relax and enjoy the tranquil surroundings.

4:30 PM: Journey to Tampaksiring

home to the revered Pura Tirta Empul, also known as the Holy Spring Temple. Witness the cascading waters of the sacred spring, believed to possess purifying and healing powers. Join the local devotees as they perform traditional cleansing rituals, immersing themselves in the revitalizing waters. Experience the tranquility and spiritual essence that emanate from this sacred sanctuary.

Tips 1

Arrive early to secure a good seat for the performance.

Tips 2

Engage with the artisans and learn about their traditional techniques.

Tips 3

Dress modestly when visiting the village.

Tips 4

Respect the local customs and traditions when participating in the ritual.

Don't just see the sights, experience them!

Travel is more than just checking off destinations on a list. It’s about immersing yourself in a new culture, connecting with local people, and creating memories that will last a lifetime.

Contact Us

item.title: EAST PART OF BALI
item.dc:creator: useradmin
item.description: Unveiling the Hidden Gems of East Bali: A Day Trip Adventure Embark on an enthralling journey through the cultural tapestry and natural wonders of East Bali with this captivating day trip adventure. Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of the region, explore ancient temples and villages, and soak in the beauty of pristine beaches. Contact […]
item.content:encoded:
Unveiling the Hidden Gems of East Bali: A Day Trip Adventure

Embark on an enthralling journey through the cultural tapestry and natural wonders of East Bali with this captivating day trip adventure. Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of the region, explore ancient temples and villages, and soak in the beauty of pristine beaches.

Contact us

09:00 AM

Depart from your hotel and embark on your east Bali adventure. 09:30 AM: Arrive at Klungkung, the former capital of the Klungkung Kingdom. Explore the Klungkung Royal Palace, once a grand residence of Balinese royalty, and admire the remnants of its architectural splendor. Witness the intricate carvings and sculptures that adorn the palace walls, offering a glimpse into the kingdom’s illustrious past.

contact us

This is the next your services.

10:30 AM: Journey to Tenganan

a secluded village nestled amidst the lush rice paddies of East Bali. Immerse yourself in the unique culture of the Bali Aga, the indigenous people of Bali, who have preserved their ancestral traditions and way of life for centuries. Stroll through the narrow streets lined with traditional houses and observe the villagers engaged in their daily activities.

12:00 PM: Savor a delectable lunch at a local warung, indulging in authentic Balinese cuisine. Enjoy the flavors of fresh seafood, spicy sambal, and aromatic rice dishes, all prepared with local ingredients and traditional cooking techniques.

1:30 PM: Goa Lawah & Bat Cave Temple

Ascend the steep stairs leading to the cave entrance and marvel at the sight of thousands of bats clinging to the ceiling. Explore the temple chambers adorned with intricate carvings and statues, and immerse yourself in the mystical atmosphere of this sacred site.

3:30 PM: Relax and unwind at Candi Dasa

a charming seaside resort town. Stroll along the pristine beach, soak up the sun, and enjoy the gentle sea breeze. Take a dip in the crystal-clear waters or indulge in a variety of water sports, such as snorkeling, diving, or kayaking.

5:00 PM: Depart from Candi Dasa

and embark on your return journey, carrying with you unforgettable memories of East Bali's rich culture, stunning landscapes, and warm hospitality.

Here are 4 of the most valuable ones for your East Bali day trip

Respect Local Customs

This tip applies throughout your journey. Dress modestly at palaces and villages, refrain from touching or climbing on structures, and be mindful of villagers' privacy when taking photos.

Support Local Communities

Purchase handicrafts directly from artisans in Tenganan to directly benefit their community.

Be Prepared for the Cave Temple

Bring a flashlight to navigate Goa Lawah's dark interior and be mindful of the bats while maintaining a quiet and respectful demeanor.

Sun Protection and Beach Essentials

Pack sunscreen, swimwear, and comfortable footwear for your relaxing afternoon at Candi Dasa. Remember to respect the marine environment by avoiding littering.

Don't just see the sights, experience them!

Travel is more than just checking off destinations on a list. It’s about immersing yourself in a new culture, connecting with local people, and creating memories that will last a lifetime.

Contact Us

item.title: Besakih Mother Temple Tour
item.dc:creator: useradmin
item.description: Besakih Mother Temple Tour Unveiling the Heart of Bali’s Spiritual and Scenic Treasures PRICE 700K Embark on a transformative journey through the heart of Bali’s spiritual and natural wonders with the Besakih Mother Temple Tour. This immersive expedition unveils the island’s rich heritage, breathtaking landscapes, and the essence of Balinese culture. Contact us Gunung Kawi: […]
item.content:encoded:
Besakih Mother Temple Tour

Unveiling the Heart of Bali's Spiritual and Scenic Treasures

PRICE 700K

Embark on a transformative journey through the heart of Bali’s spiritual and natural wonders with the Besakih Mother Temple Tour. This immersive expedition unveils the island’s rich heritage, breathtaking landscapes, and the essence of Balinese culture.

Contact us

Gunung Kawi: Unveiling the Mysteries of the Rocky Temple

Commence your exploration at Gunung Kawi, where ancient rock-cut candi temples stand majestically amidst lush rice paddies. Ascend the stairs leading to these sacred shrines, each carved into the face of a limestone cliff. Marvel at the intricate carvings that adorn their facades, remnants of a bygone era whispering tales of Balinese history. Immerse yourself in the serene atmosphere and contemplate the profound spirituality that permeates this sacred site.

Contact us

Tampaksiring: Purifying the Soul at the Holy Spring Temple

Next, embark on a pilgrimage to Tampaksiring, home to the revered Pura Tirta Empul, also known as the Holy Spring Temple. Witness the cascading waters of the sacred spring, believed to possess purifying and healing powers. Join the local devotees as they perform traditional cleansing rituals, immersing themselves in the revitalizing waters. Experience the tranquility and spiritual essence that emanate from this sacred sanctuary.

Sribatu: Savoring the Aroma of Balinese Coffee

Indulge your senses at the Sribatu Coffee Plantation, where the rich aroma of freshly roasted coffee beans fills the air. Embark on a guided tour through the verdant coffee fields, learning about the meticulous cultivation and harvesting processes that transform these ruby red berries into the island's renowned brew. Savor a cup of expertly brewed Balinese coffee, relishing its unique flavor and aroma, a testament to the island's agricultural heritage.

Besakih: Ascending to the Mother Temple of Bali

Ascend to the slopes of Mount Agung, where the Besakih Temple, Bali's largest and holiest Hindu temple complex, awaits. Explore the intricate network of temples, each dedicated to different deities, and immerse yourself in the vibrant spiritual atmosphere that envelops the site. Witness the colorful processions and traditional rituals performed by devout Balinese pilgrims.

Tegallalang: Enchanting Rice Terraces and Panoramic Vistas

Conclude your journey at the Tegallalang Rice Terrace, a UNESCO World Heritage Site renowned for its breathtaking beauty. Wander amidst the cascading emerald green rice paddies, sculpted into the hillside like a work of art. Capture panoramic photographs that encapsulate the splendor of this iconic landscape, a testament to Bali’s enduring connection to nature.

Contact us

Tips and Things to Do

Dress Code: When visiting temples, ensure shoulders and knees are covered. Be respectful and maintain a quiet demeanor. Remove footwear before entering.

Sun Protection: Pack comfortable shoes, a hat, and sunscreen for all activities.

Temple Adventures: Witness intricate carvings depicting Balinese myths at candi temples. Explore surrounding rice paddies and capture stunning photos. Participate in a cleansing ritual at a sacred spring, immersing yourself in the holy waters and admiring the temple architecture.

Coffee Plantation Experience: Take a guided tour to learn about coffee cultivation and roasting. Savor a cup of freshly brewed Balinese coffee, appreciating its unique flavor.

Tegalalang Rice Terraces: Wander amidst the cascading emerald rice terraces, sculpted into the hillsides. Capture breathtaking photos and enjoy a traditional Balinese meal at a local warung.

Don't just see the sights, experience them!

Travel is more than just checking off destinations on a list. It’s about immersing yourself in a new culture, connecting with local people, and creating memories that will last a lifetime.

Contact Us

item.title: KINTAMANI – VOLCANO TOUR
item.dc:creator: useradmin
item.description: Embark on a Journey to Witness the Enchanting Landscapes of Kintamani: Rp. 600k A Cultural and Scenic Adventure Venture into the heart of Bali’s captivating countryside and immerse yourself in the beauty of Kintamani, a region renowned for its majestic volcano, serene lakes, and lush rice terraces. Explore ancient temples, traditional villages, and coffee plantations, […]
item.content:encoded:
Embark on a Journey to Witness the Enchanting Landscapes of Kintamani:

Rp. 600k

A Cultural and Scenic Adventure

Venture into the heart of Bali’s captivating countryside and immerse yourself in the beauty of Kintamani, a region renowned for its majestic volcano, serene lakes, and lush rice terraces. Explore ancient temples, traditional villages, and coffee plantations, and discover the rich culture and warm hospitality of the local people.

09:00 AM: Depart from your hotel and embark on your Kintamani Volcano Adventure.

09:30 AM: Journey to Goa Gajah, also known as the Elephant Cave Temple, an ancient Hindu cave temple adorned with intricate carvings and sculptures. Explore the cave chambers and admire the depictions of elephants, deities, and mythological creatures. Witness the harmonious blend of nature and spirituality within this sacred site. Tips & Things to Do :

Contact Us

11:00 AM: Continue your journey to Gunung Kawi, also known as the Rocky Temple, an ancient complex of rock-cut shrines and tombs carved into the hillside. Ascend the steep stairs leading to the site and marvel at the intricate carvings that depict Hindu deities and mythical creatures. Capture stunning photographs of this unique architectural marvel amidst the lush greenery.

12:30 PM: Savor a delectable lunch at a local warung, enjoying fresh seafood and traditional Balinese cuisine.

01:30 PM: Journey to Tampaksiring, home to the revered Pura Tirta Empul, also known as the Holy Spring Temple. Witness the cascading waters of the sacred spring, believed to possess purifying and healing powers. Join the local devotees as they perform traditional cleansing rituals, immersing themselves in the revitalizing waters. Experience the tranquility and spiritual essence that emanate from this sacred sanctuary.

03:00 PM: Discover the secrets of Balinese coffee cultivation and harvesting at Sribatu, a village nestled amidst lush coffee plantations. Stroll through the verdant fields, observe the skilled workers harvesting coffee beans, and witness the traditional processing methods. Savor the rich aroma of freshly roasted coffee beans and indulge in a cup of expertly brewed Balinese coffee.

04:30 PM: Journey to Kintamani, a village renowned for its breathtaking views of Mount Batur and its serene lake. Ascend to a vantage point and marvel at the majestic volcano towering over the shimmering lake. Capture stunning photographs of this picturesque landscape and appreciate the harmonious blend of nature and human ingenuity.

Don't just see the sights, experience them!

Travel is more than just checking off destinations on a list. It’s about immersing yourself in a new culture, connecting with local people, and creating memories that will last a lifetime.

Contact Us
